name: GoodExcuse
0:
”Alexa, open Good Excuse”
”My knee hurts”
”Something is not right”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good excuse
des: This skill uses machine learning tone analysis (and a list of bathroom-related words!) to determine if someone's reasons for being out of bed is a good one.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
